description:
Be the change you want to see!
In Changemaker MOOC you learn how you are doing a project to solve a social problem from an idea. We'll show you how you can use entrepreneurial approaches to solve societal challenges, whether you want to implement a project in the areas of society, the environment, education or culture.
Step by step to your own project
The course guides you step by step to create your own project concept. You learn to develop from the intersection of your strengths and a specific social need an actionable project idea. We familiarize yourself with concepts, strategies and actors in the fields of social entrepreneurship and social business. We'll show you how to measure the exact needs of your target audience, how do you plan the activities of your project, the costs kalkulierst and a credible schedule create. You develop strategies to fund your project and effectively communicate.
Practice rather than theory
Central learning content is taught in the form of short videos. They explain everything you need to make your idea a implementable project concept. You learn as well as experienced Changemaker know young change projects. Each lesson combines the teaching of conceptual content with the creating blocks of your project concept. At the end of the course you have a clear structured approach to your change project.
What will I learn in this course?
At the end of the course the participants will be able to plan its own change project. You have learned the basic concepts of social entrepreneurship. You know where you can find more learning resources for their projects on the Internet.
What prior knowledge do I need?
To participate in this course, no prior knowledge is required. It is aimed at all people who want to learn to develop their own change project to solve a social challenge. Each / r can participate!

                                            Syllabus
                        

Chapter     Topic



Chapter 1
       Change the World


Chapter 2
       Of interest to the project idea


Chapter 3
       What is Social Entrepreneurship?


Chapter 4
       Define the project goals


Chapter 5
       Optimize the strategy


Chapter 6
       Plan the work breakdown structure


Chapter 7
       Plan the implementation of the project


Chapter 8
       The project finance


Chapter 9
       Make the project known


Chapter 10
       The present project
title: Changemaker MOOC: Social Entrepreneurship
